p: Three clinical isolates ( Salmonella Typhi, Salmonella Enteritidis and Salmonella Typhimurium from Pasteur Center, Yaound√©-Cameroon) and one bacterial strain ( Salmonella Typhi ATCC6539 from American Type Culture Collection) were used for antimicrobial evaluation. The culture media used were Salmonella-Shigella Agar (SSA from HiMedia Laboratories, India) and Mueller Hinton Broth (MHB from HiMedia Laboratories, India).
